attributes.action: Reconsider placing Staffordshire bull terriers on dangerous dig list of 1991
attributes.additional_details: These dog have a bad influence through the media and I don’t know why, if you raise a child to think that’s it okay to hit people, okay to steal okay to do what ever you want the kids would do that until he dies or changes his ways, you don’t say that person has to be put down, that person should be on a dangerous people list so it’s illegal to be born ie If the person white, Asian etc, instead you should prosecute the owner of the dog. Like if you used your car as a weapon it’s offence.
attributes.background: Hi everyone this is a serious case of discrimination against a breed of a dog, I own a staffy, his name is Marley Glover softest loving dog going brightens any body up when they come to mine. And the same for every staffy that is raised in a appropriate manner..!!!!!!
